definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Moses, the great Hebrew leader, prophet and lawgiver (prob. = Eg. mes, mesu, child, son, Eb:GS 539, cf. Di:Ex 2, 10, where see also older (abandoned) etymol.);—´[[מ]] Ex 2:10 + [[משֶָׁה]] v:Ex 2:15 +; name occurs 706 t. in Hex. (Ex 290 t, Le 86 t., Nu 233 t., De 38 t., Jos 59 t.), Ju. 4 t. + Jdg 18:30 where read [[משֶׁה]] for [[מְנַשֶּׁה]] (cf. GFM); 1Sa 12:6, 1Sa 12:8, Kings 10 t., Mic 6:4, Je 15:1, Is 63:11, Is 63:12, Mal 3:22, Ps 77:21 + 7 t.; Chr. 3 t., Da 9:11; Da 9:13; —Moses was son of Amram and Jochebed Ex 6:20, Nu 26:59 (both P), 1Ch 5:29, 1Ch 23:13 ; of tribe of Levi Ex 2:1 (E ; cf. also foregoing); (younger) brother of Aaron Ex 4:14 (J), Ex 7:1, Ex 7:2, Ex 7:7 (P), etc., and brother of Miriam Nu 26:59 (P), 1Ch 5:29 (cf. Ex 15:20 E) ; called prophet De 18:15, De 18:18, De 34:10; agent by whom ´[[י]] gave law Ex 20:19, Ex 20:20, Ex 20:21, Ex 20:22 (E) +; esp. P ([[כַּאֲשֶׁר]] ´[[אֶת־מ]] ´[[חִוׇּת י]], etc.), Ex 39:1, Ex 39:5, Ex 39:7, Ex 39:21, Ex 39:26, Ex 39:29, Ex 39:31, Ex 40:19, Ex 40:21, Ex 40:25, Ex 40:27, Ex 40:29, Ex 40:32, Le 7:38, Le 8:9, Le 8:13, Le 8:17, Le 8:27, Le 8:29 + oft.; lawgiver De 33:4, Jos 1:7, Jos 1:13 (D) +; priest, [[וְאַהֲרׂן בְּכִהֲנׇיו]] ´[[מ]] Ps 99:6. Phrases are—([[עַבְדּוֹ]], [[עַבְדִּי]], etc.) ´[[עֶבֶר י]] ´[[מ]] Ex 14:31 (J), Nu 12:7(E), De 34:5(JE), Jos 1:1 (D) + 15 t. Jos. (D); 1Ki 8:53, 1Ki 8:56, 2Ki 18:12, 2Ki 21:8, Mal 3:22, 2Ch 1:3, 2Ch 24:6, Ne 1:8, Ne 9:14, Ps 105:26; [[עֶבֶד אלהים]] ´[[מ]] 1Ch 6:34, 1Ch 24:9, Ne 10:30, Da 9:11; [[אִישׁ הָאֱלּהִים]] ´[[מ]] Ezr 3:2, Ps 90:1 ´[[תּוֹרַת מ]] Jos 8:32 (D), 1Ki 2:3, 2Ki 23:25, Mal 3:22, 2Ch 23:18, 2Ch 30:16, Ezr 3:2, Ezr 7:6, Da 9:11, Da 9:13; ´[[סֵפֶר מ]] 2Ch 25:4, 2Ch 35:12, Ne 13:1; ´[[סֵפֶר תּוֹרַת מ]] Jos 8:13 (D), Jos 23:6 (D), 2Ki 14:6, Ne 8:l.
